summary: THE EVAPORATIVE EMISSION CONTROL SYSTEMS MAY APPLY EXCESSIVE VACUUM TO THE FUEL TANKS DURING THE CANISTER PURGE CYCLE.  MINOR FUEL TANK DISTORTION COULD RESULT.  A SMALL CRACK COULD DEVELOP ON THE UPPER FUEL TANK SURFACE.  THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT WOULD THEN ILLUMINATE AND, IN SOME CASES, THE VEHICLE DRIVER NOTICED A GASOLINE ODOR. THIS RECALL FAILED .   *TT
